hero.title: Your Financial Life,
hero.description: Transform complex financial data into crystal-clear insights. Get executive-grade analysis, predictive risk alerts, and personalized action plans—all automated by advanced AI.

features.sectionTitle: Intelligent Features That Work for You

big4.title: Big 4 Decision Intelligence
big4.description: Get comprehensive financial analysis in seconds. Our AI examines your cashflow health, identifies weak points, forecasts risks, and delivers 3 prioritized action items—like having a CFO in your pocket.

categorization.title: Smart Categorization
categorization.description: Stop manually tagging transactions. Our AI learns your spending patterns and automatically categorizes purchases with 95% accuracy. It even improves over time based on your corrections.

riskProjection.title: Risk Projection
riskProjection.description: See what's coming before it hits. Our predictive engine analyzes 30/60/90-day horizons and warns you about potential cash crunches, unusual spending, or budget overruns.

aiGuide.title: How AI Makes Your Finances
aiGuide.subtitle: You don't need to be a financial expert. Our AI does the heavy lifting, giving you simple, actionable advice in plain English.

what.title: What is AI in FinanceFlow?
what.description: Think of it as a smart assistant that reads all your transactions and tells you:
what.cashflow: Are you making more than you spend?
what.problems: What problems do you need to fix?
what.risks: What financial risks are coming up?
what.actions: Exactly what to do about it (in order of priority)

features.title: 3 Ways AI Helps You Save Money

big4.title: Big 4 Insights (Your Financial Report Card)
big4.subtitle: Get a complete financial check-up in seconds
big4.description: Click one button and the AI analyzes all your transactions. In about 20 seconds, it gives you:
big4.cashflowDesc: Are you making more than you spend? Is it consistent?
big4.risksDesc: Any red flags about running out of money soon?
big4.weaknessesDesc: What categories are draining your wallet?
big4.actionsDesc: Specific steps to improve (like "reduce dining out by $200/month")
big4.howToDesc: Go to AI → Big 4 Insights in the sidebar and click Refresh Analysis. Wait 20 seconds. Read your report. That's it!

categorization.title: Smart Categorization (Your Financial Organizer)
categorization.subtitle: Stop manually sorting your spending
categorization.description: Every time you add a transaction, the AI reads the description and automatically sorts it. No more guessing if that coffee shop charge was "Dining" or "Entertainment."
categorization.accurateDesc: 95% of the time, it gets it right.
categorization.fastDesc: Works in the background. You don't wait.
categorization.smartDesc: If you correct a category, AI remembers for similar purchases.
categorization.editableDesc: If it's wrong, just change it. The AI remembers for next time.
categorization.howToDesc: Just add transactions normally. The AI does the rest in the background. Check the category, and if it's wrong, click to change it.

risk.title: Risk Warnings (Your Financial Weather Forecast)
risk.subtitle: Know about problems BEFORE they happen
risk.description: This is where the AI looks ahead. It checks if you're about to:
risk.runOutDesc: Based on your burn rate and upcoming bills
risk.overspendDesc: "You've spent 90% of your dining budget with 15 days left"
risk.howToDesc: The risk warnings appear automatically in your Big 4 Insights report. Green = you're safe, Yellow = watch out, Red = take action now.

privacy.a: Yes. Your data is encrypted and never shared. The AI runs on Google's secure servers and only you can see your analysis.

accuracy.a: Transaction categorization is 95% accurate. For insights, the AI shows you a confidence score so you know when to double-check.

cost.a: No. AI features are included in your FinanceFlow subscription. No hidden fees.

control.a: Yes. You can disable AI categorization anytime in Settings. The AI insights are optional—use them when you want.
